articles.title: Portland Trail Blazers recover from slow start to beat New York Knicks for second NBA Summer League title since 2017
articles.description: The Trail Blazers got 36 points from their reserves and beat the Knicks 85-77 on Sunday for their second NBA Summer League title since 2017. Trendon Watford had 19 points and seven rebounds en route to earning game MVP honors.

articles.title: Lowe - Why Kevin Durant and Donovan Mitchell megadeals could expand an unprecedented NBA trend
articles.description: Over the past decade, there have been seven trades in which one team sends three or more of its future first-round picks. Two more such deals, for KD and Mitchell, could happen soon. The risks are massive. So what is driving teams to make these moves?
